OOC: Just regular round lasers.

BIC: Mobster moves his hands up and catche=
s the tail, pushing the tail, hopefully out of the way...
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday=
, January 07, 2001 11:00 AM
  Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster=



  (What did he fire?  Is he still using his flamethrower?)
   
  Necroma=
ncer continued to let his wings take the abuse, he rose his left wing up an=
d blocked the shot. stress fractures continued to form as the abuse continu=
ed to take its tole. as he blocked he swung his tale around at Mobsters hea=
d. 
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 3:39 PM
    Subject: Necro=
mancer's fight with Mobster


    Mobster seen the ice blast coming, since =
this enemy has been firing them alot indeed. Mobster aimed Grenade's flamet=
hrower, and managed to destroy the ice ball with it. Then the fireballs cam=
e. Mobster tried to switch to Kracken's ice gun, but too late, bang! Mobste=
r slaps at himself to put the fire out. It does in fact, though, start to d=
efrost his arm. Was he working on Gigas' brain? He must have been! He fired=
 the flamethrower at his arm and melted the ice. He took the gun back in hi=
s left arm. Horn Drill had been known to be perfect at almost everything. M=
obster aimed at Necromancer's head, and fired...
      ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent:=
 Saturday, January 06, 2001 11:24 AM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


 =
     Necromacer curled his wings in front of him taking the brunt of Mobste=
rs attack. small cracks began to form where the shots struck. He roared par=
tly in intimidation and partly in disgust at the Alliance bot before him. h=
e fired an ice blast from his mouth followed by a fireball out of each nost=
ril.


          eGroups Sponsor
